EmailTemplate.name: VinWorx Kansas City GENERIC Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Us at VinWorx - Coming June 11th - 13th in Kansas City!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
VinWorx is back for the third user summit! Dates are set for June 11th- 13th, 2012 at the Intercontinental Hotel! Not only would we like to invite you to VinWorx , we recommend it! Here's why...
For more information and to register: http://vinworx2012kc.eventbrite.com/
WHAT IT IS:
VinWorx is a networking and advanced certification summit for MotoSnap users. A hands-on workshop, held under the VinUniversity umbrella, attendees will have the opportunity to participate in specialized sessions to train on new and existing integrated product solutions.
* Get certified on 3 levels in just 2 days!
* Space is LIMITED and will Sell out FAST!
WHO IS GOING?
Dealers:
Dealer Admins in need of Certifications MotoSnap Certified Users in need of a Refresher MotoSnap Certified Users in need of Advanced Training
Staff:
Jim Nelson, VP of Operations VinStructor Managers, VinPro Dealer Advocates, VinCare Website Support Experts
WHY GO:
Train.
FastTrax Certification
Advanced Certification opportunities
1-on-1 Consultations Available
Network.
Interact & collaborate with other dealers & users Get to know your VinCare team! Rooftop Welcome Reception overlooking the Country Club Plaza
Relax.
2 night stay at the luxurious Intercontinental Hotel
Breakfasts, lunches and hors d'oeuvres
VIP tickets to the Royals game in an exclusive suite!
For more information and to register: http://vinworx2012kc.eventbrite.com/
Save time and money through FastTrax MotoSnap Certification.
Only $549 per attendee if you pre-register now! = Less than only 1 day of standard training.
Benefit from the 1:1 consultation and the expert attention you will receive from Jim Nelson and his staff.
Benefit from the REAL value of peer-to-peer collaboration.
Any questions, feel free to contact: gina.reuscher@vinsolutions.com or pamela.lasley@vinsolutions.com
We hope to see you there!
